oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Put a candle in the window" as sung by the Christ the King's Boys' Choir, circa 1950 December 05
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Christ the King's Boys' Choir singing "Put a candle in the window" at the 1950 Fannie Battle Social Workers' Christmas tea, held at the home of Mrs. Tony Sudekum. From left to right, the singers are: Robert Kirchner, Joe Patrick, Danny Badacour, Johnny Lawrence, William Morrison, Billy Boyd, Charles York, George Patrick, Shelton Johnson and Paul St. Charles. This photograph illustrated the newspaper article "Betty Banner Heeds Bid to Fannie Battle Holiday Tea," published in the 5 December 1950 issue of the Nashville Banner. Forms part of the Fannie Battle Day Home Records. 1 photograph : b & w ; 9.5 x 7.5 in.
